page.title: List of political parties in Egypt

rev.diff:
Line 26: Line 26:
Egyptian politics are subject to unique circumstances and often defy simple classification in terms of the [[political spectrum]]. There are currently over 20 registered political parties in Egypt. Groups are sometimes associated with the political [[Left-wing politics|left]] or [[Right-wing politics|right]], especially in international circles, according to their stance on issues. While the current Egyptian constitution prohibits the formation of political parties based on religion, there are parties that seek to establish Islamic [[sharia]] laws, or uphold the article in the constitution that states that sharia law is the main source of legislation, and others that support the formation of a [[secular]] state. The following is a categorization of political parties based on their political and religious orientation, as well as their legal status:
Egyptian politics are subject to unique circumstances and often defy simple classification in terms of the [[political spectrum]]. There are currently over 20 registered political parties in Egypt. Groups are sometimes associated with the political [[Left-wing politics|left]] or [[Right-wing politics|right]], especially in international circles, according to their stance on issues. While the current Egyptian constitution prohibits the formation of political parties based on religion, there are parties that seek to establish Islamic [[sharia]] laws, or uphold the article in the constitution that states that sharia law is the main source of legislation, and others that support the formation of a [[secular]] state. The following is a categorization of political parties based on their political and religious orientation, as well as their legal status:
